transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan, mam, woh abhi present time mein main search kar raha tha toh yahan pe ek yeh apna Delhi mein hai na mam?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Main pehle product product ka naam bata deta hu silver stainless silver steel burger ring 3 inch diameter for bakery.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Yahi naam hai na mam? Toh mam yeh aapke paas ki location mein agar baat karu na main toh yeh Delhi mein hai.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Delhi mein Sadar Bazar hai na mam?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Haan, wahi wahi ke hain. Toh unse aap mam connect kar sakti hain agar aap bole toh main unki aapko detail bhej deta hu.
Customer: Haan, detail bhej do.
Executive: Haan, toh mam yeh jo yahan pe number registered hai yahi aapka WhatsApp number hai mam?
Customer: Haanji, jis number se meri baat ho rahi hai.
Hanji, wohi number hai ji.
Executive: Haan, theek hai mam, aapko is number pe detail share kar deta hu. Aur mam uska confirm kar dijiye welcome call ka ki kab tak karu kyunki main yahan pe mention kar deta hu. Waise toh same day is post karna hota hai network issue ki wajah se mam main bhi samajh sakta hu. Network nahi hai toh kaise ho sakta hai woh.
Customer: Wohi toh aaj hum kahin aur aaye hue hain na yahan pe network nahi aata bilkul bhi. Hum kal shaam ghar pahunch jayenge phir wahan pe network thoda bahut rahega.
Executive: Toh kal main aapko mam morning time, kal 11 baje aapko connect kar lu?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur mam yeh aapne jo main aapko WhatsApp karunga na toh usi number pe mujhko mera personal number hai. Toh agar kuch bhi query hua kare na toh aap mujhko us number pe connect kiya kariye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur yeh abhi aapka concern jo tha yeh jo aapko chahiye tha yeh wala abhi toh solve ho gaya hai na? Main aapko detail bhej de raha hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan, toh mam yeh jo hai na main aapka yahan pe jo concern tha isko main close kar de raha hu aur unki aapko detail send kar de raha hu, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan, mam mere liye feedback aayega aapke paas.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usko mam please de dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na?
Customer: Okay, okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed details of a Delhi-based seller.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the seller's details on WhatsApp.

- Executive closed the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback for the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- seller details, whatsapp, feedback
